List all available Pandoc releases

Source: R/salim.gen.R
pandoc_releases.Rd

Uses gh::gh() to fetch all available Pandoc releases via GitHub's REST API and returns them as a tibble containing the two columns version_nr and release_id.

Usage

pandoc_releases()

Value

A tibble.

Details

Values of the column release_id can be used as input to download_pandoc_binaries().

See also

Other Pandoc-related functions: download_pandoc_binaries(), pandoc_release_assets(), pandoc_release_id_latest(), pandoc_version_latest()
